g_sorted_applicant_not_disambiguated: records for applicants listed on a patent including executors and legal representatives of inventors
g_sorted_assignee_not_disambiguated: records for assignees listed on a patent
g_sorted_individual_not_disambiguated: records for all individual persons listed on a patent as an inventor, assignee, or applicant (does not include attorneys or examiners)
g_sorted_inventor_not_disambiguated: records for inventors listed on a patent
g_sorted_org_not_disambiguated: records for all organizations listed on a patent as an assignee or applicant

pg_sorted_assignee_not_disambiguated: records for assignees listed on an application
pg_sorted_individual_not_disambiguated: records for all individual persons listed on an application as an inventor, assignee, or applicant (does not include attorneys or examiners)

pg_sorted_org_not_disambiguated: records for all organizations listed on an application as an assignee or applicant
